name: Kin Visitantes
author: Kin Web Design

sections.description:
NOW WITH GOOGLE CHARTS!

Keep track of how many visitors reach your site, when they accessed it, what language they speak, what browser they use, where they came from, and what they looked at.

  • Beautiful Google Charts presentation
  • Dashboard widget
  • Date and time visited
  • Visitor language
  • Visitor browser and operating system
  • IP address
  • Visited page
  • Refering site

Learn more at http://www.kinwebdesign.com
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder, ‘kin-visitantes’ and all its files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
2.4

  • Improved user interface
  • Universal date filter

2.3

  • Optionally ignore [your own] IP address(s)
  • Visitor OS
  • Visitor IP address

2.2

  • Built-in support and resources
  • Improved speed

2.1

  • Dynamic pageviews graph
  • Top Sources graph
  • Top Content graph
  • UNIX timestamps
  • Business resources

2.0

  • Google Charts

1.1

  • Visitor language
  • Visitor browser
  • Visited page
  • Dashboard widget
  • Improved layouts

1.0

  • See when a visitor accessed your site
  • See where a visitor came from
  • Plugin now uses a WordPress database

0.1

  • This is the first ever Kin plugin!
